me.text:
Gude! I was born on 29.01.1996 in Aschaffenburg and I am in the process of making the web more beautiful and faster.
Living in Cologne-Ehrenfeld, studying again in Aachen and currently working at ShiftDigital.

tasks: Establishing and structuring an efficient OpenGov ticketing system
